blogPost.excerpt: Snipp.in is a tiny in browser notes taking interface and snippet manager built for speed. Without any bs the app stores everything just inside your browser without even having you to sign up.
blogPost.body: Snipp.in is a tiny in browser notes taking interface and snippet manager built for speed. Without any bs the app stores everything just inside your browser without even having you to sign up.
blogPost.title: Snipp.in - Lightweight in-browser notes, snippet manager & code editor
blogPost.author: Musthaq Ahamad

localize.description: in是一个微型的浏览器笔记记录界面和代码片断管理器，专为提高速度而构建。没有任何BS，这款应用程序甚至不需要你注册，就可以将所有内容存储在你的浏览器中。
localize.tagline: 轻量级浏览器内注释、代码段管理器和代码编辑器

localize.description: in是一個微型的瀏覽器筆記記錄界面和代碼片斷管理器，專爲提高速度而構建。沒有任何BS，這款應用程序甚至不需要你註冊，就可以將所有內容存儲在你的瀏覽器中。
localize.tagline: 輕量級瀏覽器內註釋、代碼段管理器和代碼編輯器

previous.excerpt: Learn vim without enduring boring text only tutorials. vim.so gets you the muscle repetition needed to master vim quickly using interactive exercises. Vim adds code editing super powers to your editor of choice. Learn vim fast today!
previous.title: vim.so - Learn vim fast with interactive exercises in the browser

localize.description: vim.so让你通过互动练习快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重复练习。Vim 为您选择的编辑器增加了代码编辑的超级能力。今天就来快速学习vim吧！Vim.so让你通过互动练习快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重复练习。
localize.tagline: 通过浏览器中的互动练习快速学习vim。

localize.description: vim.so讓你通過互動練習快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重複練習。Vim 爲您選擇的編輯器增加了代碼編輯的超級能力。今天就來快速學習vim吧！Vim.so讓你通過互動練習快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重複練習。
localize.tagline: 通過瀏覽器中的互動練習快速學習vim。
